tool_description: Node js Login and Signup API with JWT Secure Token That Will Expire in 7 days. with Forget Password Functionality also Hashed Password Functionality
name: Login/Signup API
title: Login/Signup API

api_list.name: Forgot Password
api_list.description:
For Forgot Password
https://login-signup-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/forgot-password
It will Receive the Following Data 
Email, Password, and secret

api_list.name: Register
api_list.description:
For Signup 
https://login-signup-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/register
It will Receive the Following Data 
Email, Password(Minimum 6 Characters), Secret (That will use For Forgot the Password).

api_list.name: Login
api_list.description:
Use post request
For Login
https://login-signup-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/login
It will Receive the Following Data 
Email, Password
